taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section alleghenienses;species reravus;

treatment.description: Coarser than no. 161, with terete canes up to 1 cm. in diameter; primocanes densely covered by acicular prickles, setae and stipitate glands closely intermixed; primocane-leaves with similarly clothed petiole and petiolules; raceme simple or with lower pedicels forking; calyx-lobes lance-attenuate with prolonged tips; petals narrowly oblanceolate, 1.4-1.8 cm. long.
